markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Limited">[Girzanje's March](/Spells.aspx?ID=1068)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Linguistic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=101" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 77</row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 30-foot burst

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You sing a prayer for war, inspiring valor in allies who hear your song. Allied creatures who can hear and understand you gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, Fortitude saves, and Will saves against [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects.

---
**Heightened (7th)** The status bonus increases to +2.

**Heightened (10th)** The status bonus increases to +3.
name: Girzanje's March

summary_markdown: You sing a prayer for war, inspiring valor in allies who hear your song.
text: Girzanje's March May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands Source Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl pg. 77 Traditions Divine, Occult Cast Two Actions verbal Area 30-foot burst Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- You sing a prayer for war, inspiring valor in allies who hear your song. Allied creatures who can hear and understand you gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls, Fortitude saves, and Will saves against mental effects. --- Heightened (7th) The status bonus increases to +2. Heightened (10th) The status bonus increases to +3.
